src: Meillä on nyt 4 kuukauden ikäisiä hiiriä, jotka olivat ennen diabeetikkoja, mutta eivät ole enää, hän lisäsi.
mt: 4-month-old mice were diabetic before, but they are not anymore, he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Tohtori Ehud Ur, Dalhousien yliopiston lääketieteen professori Nova Scotian Halifaxissa ja Kanadan diabetesliiton kliinisen ja tiedeosaston puheenjohtaja, varoitti, että tutkimus on vasta varhaisessa vaiheessa.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, Dalhousie University professor of medicine in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the clinical and scientific affairs committee of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Eräiden muiden asiantuntijoiden tapaan hän suhtautuu epäilyksellä siihen, voidaanko diabetes parantaa. Hän huomauttaa, että näillä löydöksillä ei ole merkitystä ihmisille, joilla on jo 1-tyypin diabetes.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical that diabetes can be cured. He notes that these findings are not relevant to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Maanantaina Ruotsin akatemian Nobelin kirjallisuuskomitean vakituinen sihteeri Sara Danius ilmoitti julkisesti Ruotsin radion ohjelmassa, että komitea, joka ei pystynyt tavoittamaan Bob Dylania vuoden 2016 kirjallisuuspalkinnon voittamisen tiimoilta, oli luopunut yrityksistään tavoittaa hänet.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced publicly on Swedish Radio that the committee, which had been unable to reach Bob Dylan to inform him of his win of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up its efforts to contact him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius sanoi: "Juuri nyt emme tee mitään. Olen soittanut ja lähettänyt sähköposteja hänen lähimmälle yhteistyökumppanilleen ja saanut hyvin ystävällisiä vastauksia. Tällä hetkellä se riittää hyvin."
mt: "Right now we're not doing anything. I've called and emailed his closest business partner and got very friendly responses. For now that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Aikaisemmin Ring-yhtiön toimitusjohtaja Jamie Siminoff huomautti yhtiön aloittaneen siksi, ettei hänen myymälänsä ovikelloa pystynyt kuulemaan autotalliin saakka.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that the company started because his store's doorbell couldn't be heard past the carport.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Hän sanoi rakentaneensa Wi-Fi-ovikellon.
mt: He said he built a Wi-Fi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff sanoi, että myynti kasvoi hänen esiinnyttyään vuonna 2013 Leijonanluola (Shark Tank) -ohjelmassa, vaikka tuomaristo hylkäsi hänen startupinsa rahoittamisen.
mt: Siminoff said sales grew after he appeared on the show Shark Tank in 2013, even though the panel rejected funding his startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Vuoden 2017 lopulla Siminoff esiintyi QVC-ostostelevisiokanavalla.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring myös sopi kanteen ADT Corporationin, kilpailevan turvallisuusyrityksen, kanssa.
mt: It also settled a lawsuit with ADT Corporation, a competing security company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Vaikka eräs kokeellinen rokote tuntuukin voivan vähentää ebolan kuolleisuusastetta, tähän mennessä minkään lääkkeen ei ole osoitettu selvästi soveltuvan jo saadun tartunnan hoitamiseen.
mt: While one experimental vaccine appears to reduce the Ebola fatality rate, no drug has yet been shown to be clearly effective in treating an already contracted infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Yksi vasta-ainesekoitus, ZMapp, vaikutti ensi alkuun lupaavalta kentällä, mutta viralliset tutkimukset osoittivat, ettei se auttanut ehkäisemään kuolemantapauksia toivotussa määrin.
mt: One of the experimental treatments, ZMapp, initially appeared promising, but official studies showed it did not prevent deaths as hoped.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM-kokeessa ZMappia käytettiin verrokkina, eli tieteilijät vertasivat sitä kolmeen muuhun hoitomuotoon.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning researchers compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Yhdysvaltain voimisteluliitto tukee Yhdysvaltain olympiakomitean kirjettä ja hyväksyy olympiaperheen vastaansanomattoman tarpeen edistää turvallista ympäristöä kaikille urheilijoillemme.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and accepts the need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Olemme samaa mieltä Yhdysvaltojen olympiakomitean lausunnon kanssa siitä, että urheilijoidemme, joukkueidemme ja heidän urheilulajiensa edun kannalta olisi parempi edetä järjestön sisäisen, mielekkään muutoksen kautta kuin menettämällä asemamme lajiliittona.
mt: We agree with the United States Olympic Committee's statement that it would be in the best interest of our athletes, teams and sports to move forward with a meaningful change within the organization rather than losing our status as a national governing body.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Yhdysvaltain voimisteluliitto tukee yksityistä tutkimusta, joka voi auttaa ymmärtämään, kuinka niin räikeä väärinkäyttö kuin se, josta Larry Nassarin uhrit ovat rohkeasti kertoneet, on voinut jäädä huomaamatta niin pitkään. Liitto myös toivottaa tervetulleiksi kaikki tarvittavat muutokset.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports private research that may help understand how such blatant abuse as that of which Larry Nassar's victims have bravely spoken could have gone unnoticed for so long. The Association also welcomes all necessary changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Yhdysvaltain voimisteluliitolla ja Yhdysvaltojen olympiakomitealla on sama tavoite – voimistelun ja muun urheilun tekeminen mahdollisimman turvalliseksi, jotta urheilijat voivat tavoitella unelmiaan turvallisessa, positiivisessa ja voimaannuttavassa ympäristössä.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association and the United States Olympic Committee have the same goal – making gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowering environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Brzezinski työskenteli 1960-luvun ajan ensin John F. Kennedyn neuvonantajana ja sen jälkeen Lyndon B. Johnsonin hallinnossa.
mt: Brzezinski worked in the 1960s as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and then in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Vuoden 1976 vaaleissa hän toimi Carterin ulkopolitiikan neuvonantajana ja seurasi sen jälkeen Henry Kissingeriä kansallisen turvallisuuden neuvonantajana (NSA) vuodesta 1977 vuoteen 1981.
mt: 1976 elections he served as Carter's foreign policy adviser and followed Henry Kissinger as National Security Adviser (NSA) from 1977 to 1981.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Hän avusti kansallisen turvallisuuden neuvonantajana Carteria maailman asioiden hoitamisessa diplomaattisesti, esimerkiksi Camp Davidin rauhassa vuonna 1978, Yhdysvaltojen ja Kiinan suhteiden normalisoinnissa 1970-luvun lopulla, vuoden 1979 panttivankikriisiin johtaneen Iranin vallankumouksen käsittelyssä ja Neuvostoliiton hyökättyä Afganistaniin vuonna 1979.
mt: He served as a national security advisor to Carter in the conduct of world affairs diplomatically, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978, the normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s, the 1979 Iranian Revolution that led to the hostage crisis, and the Soviet Union's invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Elokuva, jonka pääosissa ovat Ryan Gosling ja Emma Stone, sai ehdokkuuksia kaikissa tärkeimmissä palkintoluokissa.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for awards in all the major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ja Stone olivat ehdolla parhaasta miespääosasta ja parhaasta naispääosasta.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Muita ehdokkuuksia olivat muun muassa: paras elokuva, ohjaus, kuvaus, puvustus, leikkaus, musiikki, lavastus, äänitehosteet, äänitys ja paras alkuperäinen käsikirjoitus.
mt: Other nominees included: best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, editing, music, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and best original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Elokuvan lauluista kaksi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ja City of Stars, oli ehdolla parhaasta alkuperäisestä musiikkikappaleesta. Lionsgate-studio sai 26 ehdokkuutta – enemmän kuin mikään muu studio.
mt: 2 of the film's songs, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Myöhään sunnuntaina Yhdysvaltojen presidentti Donald Trump ilmoitti lehdistösihteerinsä välityksellä antamallaan lausunnolla, että Yhdysvaltojen joukot poistuvat Syyriasta.
mt: Late Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that U.S. troops will be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Ilmoitus annettiin Trumpin keskusteltua ensin puhelimessa Turkin presidentin Recep Tayyip Erdoğanin kanssa.
mt: The announcement was made after Trump first spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Lisäksi Turkki ryhtyi vartioimaan vangittuja Isis-taistelijoita, joita Euroopan maat ovat lausunnon mukaan kieltäytyneet palauttamasta kotimaihinsa.
mt: Turkey also began monitoring detained ISIS fighters, whom European countries have refused to repatriate, according to the statement.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Tämä vahvistaa jo entuudestaan laajalle levinneen teorian, jonka mukaan ainakin joillain dinosauruksilla oli höyheniä, mutta lisäksi saatiin tietoja, joita fossiileista ei yleensä löydy, esimerkiksi väristä ja kolmiulotteisesta rakenteesta.
mt: This confirms a widely held theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provided information that is not usually found in fossils, such as color and three-dimensional structure.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Eläimen höyhenpeite oli tutkijoiden mukaan päältä kastanjanruskea ja alta vaalea tai karotenoidinvärinen.
mt: The animal's fur was reportedly a reddish-brown on top and pale or carotenoid-colored underneath.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Lisäksi löytö auttaa ymmärtämään lintujen sulkien evoluutiota.
mt: The discovery also helps understand the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Koska dinosauruksen höyhenissä ei ole hyvin kehittynyttä ruodiksi kutsuttua vartta, mutta niillä on muita höyhenten ominaisuuksia – kuten väkäsiä ja höytysäteitä – tutkijat päättelivät, että ruoti on todennäköisesti näitä muita ominaisuuksia myöhäisempi evoluution kehitysvaihe.
mt: Because the dinosaur's feathers lacked the well-developed rachis, or central shaft, of modern feathers, but had other features of feathers, such as barbs and barbules, the researchers concluded that the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Sulkien rakenne viittaa siihen, että niitä ei käytetty lentämiseen vaan lämmönsäätelyyn tai soidinmenoihin. Vaikka kyseessä olikin nuoren dinosauruksen häntä, tutkijat esittivät näytteen olevan peräisin aikuisen yksilön höyhenpuvusta eikä poikasen untuvista.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but for insulation or display. While the specimen was from a young dinosaur, researchers presented the sample as being from an adult individual's plumage, not a juvenile's down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Vaikka kyseessä olikin nuoren dinosauruksen häntä, tutkijat esittivät näytteen olevan peräisin aikuisen yksilön höyhenpuvusta eikä poikasen untuvista.
mt: Although the specimen was a juvenile's tail, researchers presented the sample as being from an adult individual's feathering and not a juvenile's down.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Autopommi räjähti eilen aamulla Gaziantepin pääpoliisiasemalla Turkissa surmaten kaksi poliisia ja haavoittaen yli kahtakymmentä ihmistä.
mt: A car bomb exploded yesterday morning at the main police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring over two dozen people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Maakunnan kuvernöörin toimistosta ilmoitettiin, että loukkaantuneista yhdeksäntoista oli poliiseja.
mt: 17 of the 19 injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Poliisi sanoi epäilevänsä, että hyökkäyksen takana olisi joku Daeshin (Isil) taistelija.
mt: Police said they believed the attack was carried out by someone fighting for the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Heille selvisi, että Aurinko noudattaa samoja perusperiaatteita kuin muutkin tähdet: kaikkien heidän järjestelmänsä tähtien aktiivisuuden todettiin johtuvan luminositeetista ja pyörimis- ja kiertoliikkeestä, ei mistään muusta.
mt: They found that the Sun follows the same basic rules as all other stars: all their systems were found to be driven by luminosity, rotation, and orbital motion, not anything else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Luminositeettia ja pyörimisliikettä käytetään yhdessä määrittämään tähden Rossbyn luku, joka liittyy plasmavirtaukseen.
mt: Light and spin are used together to measure a star's Rossby number, which is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Mitä pienempi Rossbyn luku, sitä harvemmin tähdessä tapahtuu napaisuuskäännöksiä.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number, the less frequent the star experiences polar reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki kohtasi moneen otteeseen vaikeuksia matkansa aikana.
mt: Iwasaki faced difficulties on his journey.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Merirosvot ryöstivät hänet, hänen kimppuunsa hyökkäsi vesikauhuinen koira Tiibetissä, hän oli vähällä joutua naimisiin Nepalissa, ja hänet pidätettiin Intiassa.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a water buffalo in Tibet, was nearly forced into marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n-standardi toimii sekä 2,4 gigahertsin että 5,0 gigahertsin taajuudella.
mt: 802.11n standard works on both 2.4 gigahertz and 5.0 gigahertz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Siten se on taaksepäin yhteensopiva 802.11a:n, 802.11b:n and 802.11g:n kanssa, mikäli tukiasemassa on kaksi radiota.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g are backwards compatible with this, if the access point has two radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n on huomattavasti edeltäjiään nopeampi. Sen teoreettinen maksiminopeus on 600 megabittiä sekunnissa.
mt: 802.11n is significantly faster than its predecessors. Its theoretical maximum speed is 600 megabits per second.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, joka on naimisissa ja jolla on kaksi aikuista lasta, ei tehnyt suurta vaikutusta Milleriin, jolle juttu kerrottiin.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a big impression on Miller, who was told about the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Kommenttia pyydettäessä Miller sanoi: "Mike puhuu paljon kuulemisten aikana... Olin itse valmistautumassa, joten en varsinaisesti kuunnellut, mitä hän sanoi."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearings... I was preparing myself, so I didn't really listen to what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Pyrimme vuoteen 2020 mennessä leikkaamaan hiilidioksidipäästöjä BKT-yksikköä kohden huomattavasti vuoden 2005 tasosta, Hu sanoi.
mt: We are aiming to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP significantly by 2020 compared to 2005 levels, Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Hän ei antanut tarkkaa lukua, vaan sanoi, että vähennykset tehdään Kiinan kokonaistuotannon perusteella.
mt: He did not give an exact figure, but said the cuts would be based on China's total production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hän kehotti kehitysmaita "välttämään vanhaa tapaa saastuttaa ensin ja siivota jäljet myöhemmin."
mt: He urged developing countries to "avoid the old way of polluting first and cleaning up later."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Hän lisäsi, ettei "niille pitäisi kuitenkaan sälyttää velvollisuuksia, jotka ylittävät niiden kehitysasteen, vastuun ja kapasiteetin."
mt: She added that "they should not be saddled with responsibilities that exceed their level of development, responsibility and capacity."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Bakerin-Hamiltonin komissio julkaisi raporttinsa tänään kello 12 Greenwichin aikaa.
mt: The Baker-Hamilton Commission released its report today at noon Greenwich time.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Raportissa varoitetaan, ettei kukaan voi taata minkäänlaisen toiminnan pystyvän tässä vaiheessa pysäyttämään sotimisen uskonlahkojen välillä, väkivallan lisääntymisen tai ajautumisen kaaosta kohti.
mt: The report warns that no one can guarantee that any action at this stage will stop the fighting between the religious sects, the increase in violence, or the slide into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Raportti alkaa toivomalla avointa keskustelua ja konsensuksen muodostumista Yhdysvaltojen Lähi-idän politiikasta.
mt: The report begins by calling for an open dialogue and consensus on U.S. policy in the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Raportissa kritisoidaan kärkkäästi lähes kaikkia toimeenpanevan elimen nykypolitiikan näkökohtia Irakin suhteen, ja siinä kehotetaan välittömään suunnanmuutokseen.
mt: The report harshly criticizes almost all of the executive branch's current policies towards Iraq, and urges an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Ensimmäinen sen 78 suosituksesta kuuluu, että ennen kuluvan vuoden loppua tulisi tehdä uusi diplomaattinen aloite, jonka tarkoituksena on Irakin rajojen turvaaminen vihollisuuksilta ja diplomaattisuhteiden palauttaminen sen rajanaapureiden kanssa.
mt: 1 of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be made before the end of this year, with the purpose of securing Iraq's borders from hostile forces and restoring diplomatic relations with its neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, joka on senaattori ja Argentiinan presidentin puoliso, ilmoitti presidenttiehdokkuudestaan eilen illalla 50 kilometrin (31 mailin) päässä Buenos Airesista sijaitsevassa La Platan kaupungissa.
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, who is a senator and the wife of the president of Argentina, announced her candidacy for president last night 50 kilometers (31 miles) outside Buenos Aires in the city of La Plata.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Kirchner ilmoitti aikeestaan asettua presidenttiehdokkaaksi Teatro Argentinossa, samassa paikassa, jossa hän käynnisti vuonna 2005 vaalikampanjansa yhdeksi Buenos Airesin maakunnan edustajiksi senaatissa.
mt: Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at Teatro Argentino, the same place where she launched her 2005 campaign for one of the seats representing Buenos Aires Province in the Senate.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Kiista hurrikaani Katrinan jälkeen jälleenrakennukseen ja hätäapuun käytetyistä varoista herätti keskustelua. Jotkut fiskaaliset konservatiivit ovat humoristisesti kutsuneet varoja nimellä "Bushin New Orleans -diili".
mt: The debate over the use of funds for rebuilding and disaster relief after Hurricane Katrina again stirred controversy. Some fiscal conservatives have humorously called the funds the "Bush New Orleans Poker Game".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberaalien kritiikki jälleenrakennushankkeita kohtaan on keskittynyt jälleenrakennussopimusten myöntämiseen Washingtonin sisäpiiriläisinä pidetyille tahoille.
mt: The Democrats' criticism of the rebuilding contracts has focused on the contracts being awarded to Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Yli neljä miljoonaa ihmistä matkusti Roomaan osallistuakseen hautajaisiin.
mt: 4 million people traveled to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Läsnäolijoiden määrä oli niin suuri, etteivät kaikki voineet päästä hautajaisiin Pietarinaukiolle.
mt: The number of people present was so large that not all could attend the funeral in Red Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Useita suuria televisionäyttöjä pystytettiin eri puolille Roomaa, jotta ihmiset saivat katsella hautajaistoimitusta.
mt: Large television screens were set up around Rome so people could watch the funeral procession.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Monissa muissa Italian kaupungeissa ja muualla maailmassa, erityisesti Puolassa, tehtiin samanlaisia järjestelyjä, joita katseli suuri määrä ihmisiä.
mt: Similar arrangements were made in other Italian cities and elsewhere in the world, especially in Poland, which was watched by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historioitsijat ovat kritisoineet FBI:n aiempia käytäntöjä resurssien keskittämisestä helposti ratkaistaviin tapauksiin, erityisesti varastettuihin autoihin, jotta viraston onnistumisaste paranisi.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past practice of concentrating resources on easily solved cases, especially stolen cars, in order to improve the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongressi aloitti epäsiveellisyyden vastaisen hankkeen rahoittamisen verotusvuonna 2005 ja määräsi, että FBI:n on asetettava 10 agenttia tutkimaan aikuisten pornografiaa.
mt: 2005 was the first year of the Congress's anti-pornography initiative, and it mandated that the FBI assign 10 agents to investigate adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa keräsi sisävuoron korkeimman pistemäärän eli 70 juoksua vain 41 lyönnillä. Hän löi neljä juoksua yksitoista kertaa ja kuusi juoksua kaksi kertaa.
mt: Robin Uthappa took the highest score in an innings of 70 runs off 41 balls. He hit four fours eleven times and six sixes twice.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Keskivaiheen lyöjät Sachin Tendulkar ja Rahul Dravid suoriutuivat hyvin ja saivat yhdessä aikaan sata juoksua.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid did well and together scored 100 runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Mutta menetettyään kapteenin portin Intia sai vain 36 juoksua ja menetti 7 porttia vuoroparien loppuun mennessä.
mt: 36 shots were fired by the Indian captain, but he lost 7 ports and the end of the game.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Yhdysvaltain presidentti George W. Bush saapui Singaporeen aamulla 16. marraskuuta aloittaen viikon kestävän Aasian kiertomatkansa.
mt: 16 November 2002: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Singaporen varapääministeri Wong Kan Seng otti hänet vastaan. Bush myös keskusteli kauppa- ja terrorismikysymyksistä Singaporen pääministerin Lee Hsien Loongin kanssa.
mt: Singapore's deputy prime minister Wong Kan Seng received him. Bush also discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's prime minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Välivaaleissa koetun tappiollisen viikon jälkeen Bush kertoi yleisölle Aasian kaupan kasvusta.
mt: After a week of poor polling, Bush told the crowd about the growth of Asian trade.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Tiistain 25 minuutin tapaamisen jälkeen NDP-puolueen puheenjohtajan Jack Laytonin kanssa pääministeri Stephen Harper on suostunut lähettämään hallituksen "Puhtaan ilman esityksen" kaikista puolueista koostuvalle komitealle tarkasteltavaksi ennen sen toista käsittelyä.
mt: 25 minutes after his meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton on Tuesday, Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" to a committee of all parties for review before its second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton oli pyytänyt muutoksia konservatiivien ympäristölakiesitykseen tavatessaan pääministerin pyytäen konservatiivipuolueen ympäristölakiesityksen "kokonaisvaltaista kirjoittamista uusiksi".
mt: Layton had asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental policy when meeting the Prime Minister, asking the Conservative Party to "rewrite its entire environmental policy from scratch".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Siitä saakka, kun liittovaltio ryhtyi vastaamaan Tasmanian Devonportissa sijaitsevan Mersey-sairaalan rahoituksesta, osavaltion hallitus ja eräät liittovaltion parlamentin jäsenet ovat arvostelleet ratkaisua näytösluontoiseksi tempaukseksi, joka ennakoi marraskuuhun mennessä määrättäviä liittovaltion parlamenttivaaleja.
mt: Since the federal government began funding the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some members of the federal parliament have criticized the decision as a political stunt that anticipates federal parliamentary elections by November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Pääministeri John Howard on kuitenkin sanonut, että toimenpiteen ainoa tarkoitus oli estää Tasmanian viranomaisia alentamasta sairaalan tilojen luokitusta. Tätä varten myönnettiin ylimääräiset 45 miljoonaa Australian dollaria.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard has said the only purpose of the measure was to prevent Tasmanian authorities from downgrading the hospital's facilities. For this purpose, an additional 45 million Australian dollars were granted.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Uusimman tiedotteen mukaan meren pinnan korkeuslukemat osoittavat tsunamin syntyneen. Lähellä Pago Pagoa ja Niuea havaittiin ilmeistä tsunamitoimintaa.
mt: The latest reports indicate that sea level gauges show a tsunami has been generated. There is evidence of a tsunami in the vicinity of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tonga ei ole ilmoittanut suurista aineellisista tai henkilövahingoista, mutta sähköt katkesivat väliaikaisesti, mikä tiettävästi esti Tongan viranomaisia saamasta Tyynenmeren tsunamivaroituskeskuksen lähettämää tsunamivaroitusta.
mt: Tonga has not reported any major material or human damage, but power was briefly cut, which likely prevented Tongan officials from receiving a tsunami warning from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Neljä havaijilaiskoulua rantaviivalla tai lähellä rantaviivaa suljettiin koko keskiviikoksi, vaikka varoitukset poistettiin.
mt: 4 Hawaiian schools on or near the shoreline were closed for the entire Wednesday, even though the warnings were lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Yhdysvaltain presidentti George W. Bush piti ilmoitusta tervetulleena
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bushin tiedottaja Gordon Johndroe kutsui Pohjois-Korean sitoumusta "huomattavaksi askeleeksi kohti tavoitetta saada Korean niemimaan todistetusti ydinaseettomaksi."
mt: Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a significant step toward the goal of having the Korean peninsula denuclearized."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Atlantin hurrikaanikauden kymmenes nimen saanut myrsky, subtrooppinen myrsky Jerry, muodostui tänään Atlantin valtamerellä.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Kansallinen hurrikaanikeskus NHC toteaa, ettei Jerry aiheuta tässä vaiheessa vaaraa maalla.
mt: The National Hurricane Center reports that Jerry does not currently pose a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Yhdysvaltain puolustusvoimien insinöörijoukot arvioivat, että kuuden tuuman sademäärä saattaisi murtaa aiemmin vaurioituneet tulvapadot.
mt: 6 inch rainfall could breach previously damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Yhdeksäs kaupunginosa, jossa vesi nousi hurrikaani Katrinan aikana 20 jalan korkeuteen, peittyy tällä hetkellä vyötäisille asti nousevaan veteen sen ylitettyä rantavallit.
mt: 9th district, where water rose to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now covered by water that has risen above the levees.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Vesi valuu penkereen yli 100 jalan levyisellä osuudella.
mt: 100-foot stretch of the levee is overtopped by water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Commonsin ylläpitäjä Adam Cuerden ilmaisi turhautumisensa poistoista puhuessaan Wikinewsille viime kuussa.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration with deletions in an interview with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Hän [Wales] suoraan sanoen valehteli meille alusta alkaen. Ensin toimimalla ikään kuin syyt olisivat oikeudellisia. Toiseksi teeskentelemällä kuuntelevansa meitä aina siihen asti, kun hän poisti taiteen.
mt: He [Wales] lied to us straight from the beginning. First by acting as if the charges were legal. Second by pretending to listen to us until he removed the art.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Yhteisön ärtymys johti nykyisiin pyrkimyksiin laatia seksuaalista sisältöä koskevat käytännöt sivustolle, jolla on miljoonia avoimen lisenssin tiedostoja.
mt: The community's anger led to current efforts to create guidelines for sexual content on a site with millions of open license files.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Tehty työ oli ensimmäkseen teoreettista, mutta ohjelma kirjoitettiin simuloimaan Sagittariuksen galaksista tehtyjä havaintoja.
mt: The work was initially theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Tiimi toivoi havaitsevansa vuoroveden vaikutuksia galaksin pimeän aineen ja Linnunradan pimeän aineen välillä.
mt: The team hoped to detect the effect of tides between dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Samoin kuin kuun vetovoima vaikuttaa maahan aiheuttaen vuoroveden, niin myös Linnunradan vetovoima vaikuttaa Jousimiehen kääpiöellipsigalaksiin.
mt: Just as the moon's gravity affects the Earth causing tides, so too does the Milky Way's gravity affect the Sagittarius Dwarf Elliptical Galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Tutkijat pystyivät päättelemään, että pimeä aine vaikuttaa muuhun pimeään aineeseen samalla tavalla kuin tavallinen aine.
mt: Researchers were able to determine that dark matter interacts with other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Tämän teorian mukaan suurin osa galaksin pimeästä aineesta ympäröi sitä eräänlaisena sädekehänä ja koostuu suuresta määrästä pieniä hiukkasia.
mt: This theory posits that most of the dark matter in the galaxy is arranged in a shell-like structure and consists of a large number of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Tehtaasta näyttää television uutisraporteissa nousevanvalkoista savua.
mt: The factory appears to be emitting white smoke in television news reports.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Paikalliset viranomaiset kehottavat tehtaan lähellä asuvia pysymään sisätiloissa, sammuttamaan ilmastointilaitteet ja välttämään hanaveden juomista.
mt: Local authorities advise residents near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and avoid drinking tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Japanin ydinvoimaviraston mukaan laitoksella on havaittu radioaktiivista cesiumia ja jodia.
mt: The Japan Atomic Energy Agency reports radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected at the site.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Viranomaiset arvelevat sen tarkoittavan sitä, että voimalan uraanipolttoainetta sisältäneet säiliöt ovat saattaneet murtua ja alkaneet vuotaa.
mt: Officials believe this means the uranium fuel tanks at the plant may have ruptured and begun leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Tohtori Tony Moll löysi lääkkeille erittäin vastustuskykyisen tuberkuloosin (XDR-TB) Etelä-Afrikan KwaZulu-Natalin alueelta.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll found a highly drug-resistant strain of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal region.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Haastattelussa hän sanoi uuden variantin olevan erittäin huolestuttava ja hälyttävä erittäin korkean kuolleisuusasteen vuoksi.
mt: In an interview, he said the new variant was very alarming and very concerning due to its high mortality rate.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Jotkut potilaat ovat saattaneet saada tartunnan sairaalassa, Moll uskoo, ja ainakin kaksi heistä kuului sairaalan terveydenhoitohenkilöstön.
mt: Some patients may have contracted the infection in the hospital, Moll believes, and at least two of them were members of the hospital's health care staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
